# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  invert1.cir tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}INVERT1/invert1.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> invert1.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}INVERT1/invert1.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;mos1;resistor;capacitor")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}INVERT1/invert1.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP invert1.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}INVERT1/invert1.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} invert1.cir ${OutputDataDir}/INVERT1/invert1.cir.prn invert1.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}INVERT1/invert1.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED invert1.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}INVERT1/invert1.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;mos1;resistor;capacitor")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}INVERT1/invert1.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> invert1.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}INVERT1/invert1.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;mos1;resistor;capacitor")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}INVERT1/invert1.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP invert1.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}INVERT1/invert1.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} invert1.cir ${OutputDataDir}/INVERT1/invert1.cir.prn invert1.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}INVERT1/invert1.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED invert1.cir)
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}INVERT1/invert1.cir.verify PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;mos1;resistor;capacitor")
endif()
